ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Dredd leads the resistance which is starting to get Citi-Def Units.
Nort commander staff is becoming concerned about the devastation Rogue wreaks, and they begin a massive manhunt for him. Once located they send in their primitive genetic troops.
